lead_paragraph: More than 5,000 students were prevented from taking the college entrance test on Saturday in what a spokesman said was the first known nationwide cancellation in its history.

headline.main: ACT, Citing Breach, Cancels Exam in South Korea and Hong Kong

snippet: More than 5,000 students were prevented from taking the college entrance test on Saturday in what a spokesman said was the first known nationwide cancellation in its history.
